document_data.caption: A map of Hordelands tribal territories, showing that of the Khassidi.
document_data.name: Khassidi
document_data.mainbody: The '''Khassidi''' were a tribe of nomadic [[human]]s living in the [[Hordelands]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste|48}} They were among the tribes mistakenly called "[[Tuigan]]" by outsiders following the [[Horde Wars]].
document_data.Territory: The Khassidi lived in the northwestern regions of the Endless Waste. Their territory bordered the lands of the [[Commani]] and [[Tuigan]] tribes.
document_data.Society: They spoke the [[Khassidi language]], a language influenced by the [[Raumathar|Raumatharan Empire]].
document_data.History: The Khassidi were allies with the Commani tribe, whose territory was to the south, sharing a common history with them at many points.
